General.Name: Dynacolor
General.Description: DynaColor, Inc. provides video surveillance products and automatic optical inspection systems in Taiwan and internationally. It offers speed dome cameras, DVR products, NVR products, IP cameras, intelligent IP cameras, and AI based surveillance systems, as well as FA cameras and systems. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 116, Jou Tz Street, Taipei, Taiwan, 114
